product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Compact Scout Knife
long_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Compact Scout knife is the perfect blade to keep tucked away in a pocket. You never know when you might need it. Partially-serrated blade is made of high carbon stainless steel that offers great edge retention and rope-cutting ability. Glass-filled nylon grip and oversize finger notch maximize comfort and minimize slippage. Lock Back feature locks the blade securely in place when open and enhances safety when closing.
